title: Looking for modern scripts similar to the one blueprint magazine uses
content:
I am looking for a modern script font similar to the one blueprint magazine uses.

[http://images.businessweek.com/ss/06/10/martha/image/bp454201.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141106221135/http:/images.businessweek.com/ss/06/10/martha/image/bp454201.jpg "http://images.businessweek.com/ss/06/10/martha/image/bp454201.jpg")

I am not looking for the exact blueprint font, but one that is similar.  
I have seen one and can't seem to locate it.

\*thanks\*
author: mnott

comments.content: Fling is what Blueprint uses.. I am looking for a similar. but different font.

Sorry. I didn’t read your post very well.

BTW, is Kursivschrift the one you’re looking for?

Kursivschrift is good ... also looking at Oxtail and Eidetic Neo.

Any others out there?
It’s not a script font. But how about [Odile](http://web.archive.org/web/20141106221135/http:/www.vllg.com/Kontour/Odile/mudTyper+Weights/)?
If you like Eidetic Neo, you might like [Esta Pro Display](http://web.archive.org/web/20141106221135/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/esta-pro/).
